import React from 'react'; export default function Basket(props) { const {cartItems, onAdd, onRemove}=props; const itemsPrice =cartItems.reduce((a,c) => a+c.price * c.qty, 0); const taxPrice = itemsPrice * 0.15; const shippingPrice = itemsPrice > 3000 ? 0 : 350; const totalPrice = itemsPrice + taxPrice + shippingPrice; return (
